title: The beggars bush written by Francis Beavmont and John Fletcher.
author: Fletcher, John, 1579-1625.
publisher: Printed for Humphrey Robinson, and Anne Mosely ... ,
notes: Beaumont's contribution to this is doubtful.  Attributed to Fletcher and Massinger.  Cf. Camb. hist. Eng. lit; Fleay, Biog. chron.; encyc. brit. 11th ed.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
